entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
